tool.name: Count FASTA Length
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool counts the length of each fasta sequence in the file. The output file has two columns per line (separated by tab): fasta titles and lengths of the sequences.
-----
**Example**
- assume the input file contains fasta sequences::
>seq1 TCATTTA >seq2 ATGGCGTCGGCC >seq3 TCACATGATG
- the tool will return(first column is the titles, second column is the length of the sequences)::
>seq1 7 >seq2 12 >seq3 10
